About Us

Home>Blog

Web Design and Digital Marketing Agency

Welcome to TechSlideITS, Thanjavur’s premier digital marketing agency, meticulously tailored for the ambitious startups of today. Firstly, understanding the nuances of the ever-evolving digital landscape is paramount. As you embark on this pivotal journey, one might ponder the complexities of the online world. However, with the seasoned expertise of our web design company and our unwavering commitment to strategies endorsed by SEO experts, you’re undeniably in trusted hands.

Moreover, initiating a business journey isn’t solely about setting sail; it’s about partnering with the right SEO company that understands your vision. Consequently, as you venture forth, we at TechSlideITS stand beside you, ensuring that your digital endeavors not only take off but soar to unparalleled heights. Additionally, our mission transcends beyond mere service; we believe in forging lasting relationships. Therefore, initiate your growth trajectory with us, and together, let’s craft a digital narrative that resonates, engages, and delivers results beyond expectations.

What do we Stand for?

Website eCommerce Marketing

Our dedicated Website Services

  • Website designing
    Our unique website designs will help you establish your business' online presence
  • Trendy Designs
    Taking your brand to the next level requires trending design. We offer the best design to suit your business needs.
  • Strategic Planning
    In order to improve your business, we develop a strategy before building your website
  • Business Automation
    Automate your business with a user-friendly ERP, HR management, LMS, etc.
  • Content creation
    Google gives a higher ranking to websites with unique and high-quality content.
  • Secure Coding
    Our code security services ensure cyber threat detection and tools for remediation.

Tailored ecommerce solutions

 

  • ecommerce website
    We always suggest and make the latest and trendy e-commerce website designs.
  • payment gateway
    Offered the most secure and high success rate with PCI DSS 3.2.1 Compliance.
  • logistics solutions
    Our integrated logistics solutions provide multi-city pickup with automated tracking facilities.
  • Multi Vendor Solution
    Now you can sell products from others. We allow multi-vendor set-up at your online store.
  • Customer Care Solutions
    Our cloud telephony solutions provide a world-class IVR call center setup comes with CRM, call recording, etc.
  • eCommerce Hosting
    Our most secure eCommerce hosting solutions ensure full security of your online store and its data.

Building your Brand

  • Global SEO
    Guaranteed result seo services will increase your business around the world to improve your sales.
  • Local SEO
    Target people in your location? Our local search engine service will increase your ranking in Google search by your location.
  • Social Media Marketing
    Create trends for your company with our dedicated Social Media Marketing service.
  • Social Media Management
    Our dedicated social media professionals manage your social media accounts so that they become popular and professional.
  • Digital Marketing
    Enhance the look and feel of your company through digital marketing. Powerful and cost effective marketing service.
  • Branding & ORM
    Need to boost your brand's reputation? Our ORM and Branding service can satisfy your needs in this situation.

Working with experts around the world

Our story

  • 2019

    Company Foundation

    Early start of our company and the first step into the business in the name of Reliable Infotech as a sole proprietorship.

  • 2019

    New Products Integration

    Development of new innovative solutions in Social Media Automation.

  • 2020

    Business Collaboration

    The beginning of active interaction with our business partners.

  • 2021

    Customer Care Support

    Launched Virtual Customer Care Center that aimed to help our customer's business deliver leading-edge customer service solutions.

  • 2021

    Far Growing On Services

    We pursued to bring a high-quality and widely-ranged add on product and services to our partners.

  • 2021

    Implement Fully Automated SEO Reports

    Implemented Automated SEO Reports System that track every keyword on a daily basis. 

  • 2022

    New Name New Begning

    New beginnings as a limited liability company to grow and expand further. Reliable Infotech become TechSlide IT Solutions OPC Private Limited.
